Overview:
The Spring 2025 Faculty Metrics Excel summarizes departmental teaching activity at CCSU. It reports faculty headcounts, student credit hours, and the balance of instructional load between full-time (FT) and part-time (PT) faculty, allowing for quick comparisons across departments. The file also includes the percentage of student credit hours taught by FT versus PT faculty.

Abbreviations Explained:

FT = Full-Time (faculty employed full-time)

PT = Part-Time (faculty employed part-time)

Faculty Headcount = Number of faculty teaching courses in a department

Student Credit Hr = Total student credit hours taught (measure of workload)

Credit Hr/Faculty = Average student credit hours per faculty member

% Student Credit Hrs by FT = Proportion of student credit hours taught by full-time faculty
